about_the_game:
The protagonist is a poker player who only cares about playing cards, and he has always been single. On his 30th birthday, he received a magical card that could hypnotize other girls. As a card player, what does he want to use this ability for?


"Hypnosis Card" is a card battle game centered around deck building, which introduces a body part concept. Players have access to many cards from five major genres. Encounter various events on randomly generated maps, develop the plot, and have exciting battles with cute girls.


Kanome Shinichi
The younger sister brought here by my stepmother. She likes sports and good at both morals and academics. She is friendly to others, and is very popular. But in fact, he hates any boy who comes close to her, and she is especially cold towards me.
Measurements: 82 58 88


Kasuga Nana
The top maid in the maid café. Always dressed as a cat. She is cute and enthusiastic and is the pillar of my soul. She is so popular with guests that sometimes it's difficult to name her for service.
Measurements: 98 62 92



❤ 5 beautiful girls
There are 5 different girls to encounter in the game!

❤ Dynamically changing map
Maps are randomly generated, and each experience is completely different.

❤ Random mysterious events
Have many mysterious events, trigger plots or powerful cards? It all depends on your choice.

❤ Rich cards and combinations
Customizable decks to form different strategies!

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game contains some violence elements which may not appropriate for all ages.
All characters in this game are over the age of 18.
Some of the dialogue is sexually suggestive.

name: Hypnosis Card

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 或更高
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Hypnosis Cards is a deck-building game that introduces a novel concept of parts. Players can use numerous cards to engage in card battles with five girls.
supported_languages:
English, Russian, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
